segments.text: There is something wrong with my girlfriend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The department manager is all over her . He says he loves her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about your friend ? Did she fall for him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course not ! She thinks he's an apple-head . She doesn't like an apple-headed man , you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now you don't have the butterflies in your stomach , do you ?
segments.speaker: S2
